name: Eow Lffort Dower Tefense
description:
deep gameplay - place your tower to start each round

difficulty that makes elden ring pee its pants - each wave has 1 more enemy, they move a little faster, and they spawn a little closer together

made for low effort jam 21

click your tower during the round to enable a fun bug that breaks the game i call it weirdcore glich mode (dont do it you will lose)

the lore: once theere was a bunch of people called the towenerds and they liked towers but then the evil glorpagops started running down the road so the towenerds shooted the lazers from their towers at them
